page.title: 02Local and National News.
page.content: Our group interviewed Reverend Jenkyns of Stokesay Parish and Mrs. Roberts who are responsible for the production of the parish newsletter.This month's letter is issue number 36 of the Stokesay group of parishes which are Acton Scott,Stokesay and Wistanstow with Cwm Head in the County of Shropshire and the Diocese of Hereford.The Newsletter has been produced for 12 years and is distributed over a wide area,giving local news,forthcoming events and church services.The children's page is set out by Mrs. Roberts.There are four and a half pages of advertisements with 62 local firms advertising who pay 5 pounds for adverts in 11 issues as July and August is a joint issue. The Newsletter is edited by Reverend Jenkyns and Mrs. Roberts as the news comes in.They work to duplicate 950
